title: D. Is it rated - 3
statement:
Input

The first line contains a string $$$S$$$.

The second line contains an integer $$$X$$$.

Constraints

  • $$$|S|=3$$$
  • $$$0 \le X \le 10^9$$$
  • The input is guaranteed to be valid.
